actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income $1,000 of interest on savings in the case of an individual taxpayer.

summary.text: Small Savers' Act - Excludes from gross income, under the Internal Revenue Code, amounts received as dividends or interest on deposits or withdrawable accounts in a domestic savings and loan association, bank, credit union, or similar thrift institution. Limits the exclusion allowed under this Act to $1,000 for any person for any taxable year.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income $1,000 of interest on savings in the case of an individual taxpayer.
